name: quick-bookmarks-menu
description: A chrome extension gives you quick access to your bookmarks.

scripts.predev: npm run clean && npm run type-check
scripts.dev: npm run build:static && NODE_ENV=development node build.js
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run type-check
scripts.build: npm run build:static && NODE_ENV=production node build.js

author: yuhaofe
